Author: fishonthesun
Text: Seconding this and also yes dietitian is the college degree one

Author: aquaticmollusc
Text: If you're looking to consume at maintenance to avoid so much gain, have you considered getting a dexa scan done? A lot of people aren't good at guessing how much lean mass they're made of, and with fat being an endocrine/exocrine (fuck if I know i'm not a doctor just a part time nerd) organ secreting hormones and all that to keep itself alive...where i'm going with this is a dexa can help you see where you're at for lean mass and a dietitian or whichever one has the college degree can help you understand how to eat for the body you have to be it's best. I'm not saying you have to or anything but a better understanding of what you're made of might help -- i'm considering it for myself in the next 6 months.
